channel.title: Bread on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on Family Recipes

item.title: No-Knead Bread
item.description: Ingredients 3 3/4 cups (450g) all purpose flour 1 1/2 cups (340g) water, lukewarm (~ 105 degrees) 1 1/2 teaspoon (9g) salt 2 1/4 teaspoons (7g) instant yeast or active dry yeast Recipe Combine all of the ingredients in a large mixing bowl, or a large food-safe plastic bucket. Mix and stir everything together to make a very sticky, rough dough. If you have a stand mixer, beat at medium speed with the beater blade for 30 to 60 seconds.
